title: PMS 2.0 527 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 8 Preview, #PMSHalloween With Coach Jason Brown & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys work through the entire system and switcher going down minutes before the show while all dressed in Halloween costumes. They discuss the Packers thrilling victory over the Cardinals in Arizona on Thursday Night Football, and how impressive the Packers defense was, the Same Game Parlay falling short by 2 of the 6 legs, and Pat and AJ go through the entire week 8 NFL spread and make their picks of the week. Joining the program briefly through the technical difficulties like he always does on Feel Good Friday, is Netflix and Coaching Legend, Coach Jason Brown. Coach JB goes through all the different games this weekend in college football and gives his undisputed lock of the weekend, gives his thoughts on the Mike Tomlin press conference, and who he ultimately thinks will wind up as the Head Coach of USC. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
